description.narrative: Engro Polymer & Chemicals Limited (EPCL or the Company) is the only fully integrated chlor-vinyl chemical complex in Pakistan. It is involved in manufacturing, marketing and distribution of poly-vinyl chloride (PVC) and chlor-vinyl allied products, including vinyl chloride monomer, caustic coda, hypochloric acid and sodium hypochlorite. The Company is undertaking implementation of a Hydrogen Peroxide plant and a few efficiency projects and has invited IFC to consider supporting its investment program.

Implementation of the Project is expected to increase local availability of Hydrogen Peroxide (H202) in the Country. Customers will benefit from shorter delivery time and lower inventory costs. The Project is also expected to maintain the Company's competitiveness through value addition. The proposed investment qualifies as a climate change mitigation project and is expected to achieve some reductions in annual GHG emissions. In addition, the Project will create jobs and enable transfer of technical and managerial know-how. IFC anticipates that the Project will lead to increased competitiveness of the PVC and base chemicals sector, which will support the growth of the main users of these products such as the textile, building and construction sector.
